metadata.title: CVE-2023-42118 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: [Exim libspf2 Integer Underflow Remote Code Execution Vulnerability]

criterions.comment: exim4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libspf2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
